channel.title: Set Priorities on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Set Priorities on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Ability to set priorities and meet deadlines
item.description: [Location: Health_Canada_interview-4, 20:29] DEFINITION Organize time, work, and resources to accomplish objectives effectively; focuses personal efforts on achieving results consistent with the organization’s objectives. QUESTIONS Often/typically, your work day isn’t all laid out for you and you need to decide what you’ll do first, second, third, etc. Could you tell us about a time when it was especially tricky to manage your time because of competing demands? What situation where you working in?
